texto: performance of conformant assessments. Tool Developers Developing tools that will support assessors 2, 3, 4, 5 by collecting, recording and classifying evidence in the performance of assessments. Part 1 (informative) is an entry point into ISO/IEC TR 15504. It describes how the parts of the suite fit together, and provides guidance for their selection and use. It explains the requirements contained within ISO/IEC TR 15504 and their applicability to the performance of an assessment. Part 2 (normative) of ISO/IEC TR 15504 defines a two dimensional reference model for describing processes and process capability used in a process assessment. The reference model defines a set of processes,
